title: An Agricultural Officer in Papua and New Guinea
creator_credit: William Shepherd, Maslyn Williams, Australian Commonwealth Film Unit and Australian National Film Board
brief_description: Presents the work being done in Papua and New Guinea by the Department of Agriculture to produce better stock and crops, and the opportunities for young men in this field. Various special training and research centres are shown, including the veterinary laboratory, rubber experimental station, cattle breeding station, and extension centres where people are trained as Agricultural Field Assistants.
